title: File structure for your Vue project
summary: Suggested file structure for Vue + Vite blog project with `src/`, `assets/`, `components/`, `content/`, `pages/`, `App.vue`, and `main.ts`. Public assets in `public/`. Configure using `vite.config.ts`.
